articles.description: Adam Peaty is denied in his bid for gold but, on a night of pure Olympic emotion, departs content after the dark places he has been.
articles.title: Olympic swimming: Adam Peaty departs content on night of pure Olympic emotion

articles.description: Andy Murray's retirement remains on hold after an escape act saw the British icon and Dan Evans fight off five match points to win their Olympics men's doubles match.
articles.title: Andy Murray: British tennis great's career continues after Olympics doubles win

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Mercedes’ stunning third win in four races proves there is plenty of life in the F1 season going into the summer break.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix: F1 back to unpredictable best at summer break

articles.description: Adam Peaty has to settle for Olympic silver as Italian Nicolo Martinenghi snatches gold in the 100m breaststroke final in Paris.
articles.title: Olympics swimming: Adam Peaty takes breaststroke silver as Nicolo Martinenghi wins shock gold

articles.description: England's Test series win over West Indies shows the team's "progression" but they are "not the finished article" according to coach Brendon McCullum.
articles.title: Brendon McCullum: England 'not finished article' despite 3-0 series win over West Indies

articles.description: Bob Ballard was referencing the Australian women's swimming team who had won gold in a freestyle relay.
articles.title: Bob Ballard: Olympics commentator axed over sexist remark

articles.description: American gymnast Simone Biles dazzles on her Olympics return and shows she is back to her best three years after suffering the "twisties".
articles.title: Simone Biles dazzles on Olympic gymnastics return at Paris 2024

articles.description: Paris Olympic Games organisers say they are "sorry" if scenes in Friday's opening ceremony caused offence.
articles.title: Olympics opening ceremony: Paris 2024 sorry for causing offence after complaints
